text: Group D of UEFA Women's Euro 2017 had teams like England, Portugal, Scotland and Spain. The matches were played from 19 to 27 July 2017. == Teams == Draw position Team Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance UEFA rankingfor final draw FIFA rankingat start of event D1 2013 (1984, 2009) 3 5 D2 — 11 21 D3 2013 (1997) 6 13 D4 — 23 38 == Standings == In the quarter-finals: * The winners of Group D, England, advance to play the runners-up of Group C, France. * The runners-up of Group D, Spain, advance to play the winners of Group C, Austria. == Matches == All the times are in local times (UTC+2). === Spain vs
